purpose: Consistent, minimal, line-art diagrams for 60 business models

typography_labels.fallback: if labels are essential, use 1â€“3 tiny tags only

global_rules: use accent color only for the key mechanism

grid_diffusion.description: Uniform grid of small icons; a few items highlighted step-by-step with rightward arrows.

funnel_bottleneck.description: Multiple inputs converge; one central bottleneck or decision gate; side outputs optional.

venn_focus.description: Two or three overlaps; narrow almond-shaped focus highlighted.

distribution_shift.description: Two bell curves; observation dot forces shift to a new curve.

spotlight_vs_core.description: Narrow spotlight (personality, promotion) on left; irregular core mass (character, capability) on right.

hub_with_addons.description: Solid core block at center with detachable modules (pills or tiles) around it; accent shows paid add-ons.

flywheel.description: Circular arrows reinforcing motion; accent on the force injector.

two_sided_market.description: Left and right groups feed a central platform; cross-arrows indicate value exchange.

layered_stack.description: Stacked layers with optional side modules; accent highlights monetized layer.

modules.name: <module or option>
modules.icon_hint: <simple icon idea, e.g., baggage, seat, software>

emphasis.rule: use accent only on monetized options and revenue arrows

image_prompt.system: Create a clean vector diagram on a dark canvas that follows style_constants.
image_prompt.content: Draw the core and modules per elements; show flows with arrows; highlight only the monetized parts with the accent color.
image_prompt.composition: Centered layout, generous negative space, consistent stroke widths, no text unless tiny markers are essential.
image_prompt.aesthetics: Flat matte, no gradients, subtle soft shadow, uniform icon language.
image_prompt.negatives: Exclude logos, watermarks, UI, photographs, and long text.

example_filled.core_concept: Sell a low-priced core, then monetize high-margin optional features the customer selects.
key_relationships: Core purchase unlocks menu of optional modules
Revenue concentrates in paid add-ons, not the core

visual_metaphor.rationale: A central core with detachable modules makes the upsell mechanism obvious.

core.badge: tiny hollow tag to imply 'low price' without text

emphasis.rule: accent only on paid modules and the revenue arrows

image_prompt.system: Minimal vector diagram, dark background, clean line art, consistent with style_constants.
image_prompt.structure: Use hub_with_addons: a large hollow rounded rectangle at center as the core; six pill-shaped modules arranged in a loose ring around it.
image_prompt.content: Add a tiny neutral customer icon to the left feeding the core with a base arrow. From the core, draw accent arrows to each add-on module. Keep modules evenly spaced; use accent fill on modules and accent stroke on upsell arrows.
image_prompt.composition: Center the core; maintain wide negative space; keep stroke base_px for neutral lines and accent_px for revenue flows; avoid any text except tiny legend markers if necessary.
image_prompt.aesthetics: Flat matte, subtle soft shadow under core and modules, no gradients, no 3D.
image_prompt.negatives: No brand logos, no watermarks, no long labels, no UI mockups, no photographs.
